items.description: ADEX Data Model name. It has to be SoilHealth
ADEX Entity type. It has to be Resource

location.description: Location associated with a resource Item (a spatial point), a group of resource items (a spatial region) or even an observation in case of a mobile sensor.

cropSpeciesInfo.description: Information of crops corresponding to this observation.

landIdentityInfo.description: The unique land identification information corresponding to this observation.

surveyNumber.description: The unique land survey number allocated to the land corresponding to this observation.

baseSurveyNumber.description: The base survey number of the land corresponding to this observation.

landParcelID.description: The ULPIN(Unique Land Parcel Identification Number) representing the land parcel corresponding to the observation.

subdivisionNumber.description: The subdivision number from the land survey number corresponding to this observation

localeInfo.description: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

subdistrictName.description: Name of the subdistrict corresponding to this observation.  A subdistrict is also called as a tehsil, mandal, tahsil, tahasil, taluka, taluk, or taluq across the Indian states.

countryName.description: Name of the country corresponding to this observation.

wardName.description: Ward name corresponding to this observation.

clusterCode.description: The cluster code corresponding to this observation.

countryCode.description: Name of the country code corresponding to this observation.

clusterName.description: Name of the cluster corresponding to this observation. A cluster or a firkas represents a group of villages.

districtName.description: Name of the district corresponding to this observation.

validFrom.description: The instance from which an official report/document or consent or service corresponding to this observation is valid.

generalAdvisory.description: A general advisory to the farmers, for the cultivation of crops in regards to the conditions of weather, soil ,land etc. It may include warnings of potential catastrophical events.

testDateTime.description: The date and time at which the sample is being tested in the laboratory or the testing centre.

soilCategory.description: The soil category may be specified as per the national system of soil classification or customizing the WRB(World Reference Base) codes.

soilMoisture.description: Volumetric Water Content (VMC) is the  numerical measure of soil moisture. It is simply the ratio of water volume to soil volume.

soilClass.description: The soil class may be specified as per the national system of soil classification or customizing the WRB(World Reference Base) codes.

electricalConductivity.description: The measure of electrical conductivity of the entity corresponding to this observation.

validTill.description: The specific period of time during which a document, authorization, offer or permission remains legally or effectively acceptable/applicable.

sampleID.description: The unique ID representing the sample corresponding to this observation

healthCardNum.description: The unique number assigned to the soil health card corresponding to this observation.

testCentreCode.description: The unique code of the centre at which the sample is being tested.

sampleDateTime.description: The date and time at which the sample is being collected corresponding to this observation.

pH.description: The measure of the acidity or basicity.

testCentreID.description: The unique ID of the centre at which the sample is being tested.

testCentreName.description: The name of the centre at which the sample is being tested.

nutrientInfo.description: The chemical elements and compounds that are necessary for plant growth, reproduction, metabolism.
